personalInfo.name: Mustafa Alsaqer
personalInfo.title: Computer Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Passionate web developer with 5+ years of experience in creating modern, responsive web applications. Specialized in JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Strong problem-solving skills and a commitment to writing clean, efficient code.

experience.description: Led development of complex web applications using React and Node.js. Worked with a team of 5 developers to improve application performance by 40%.
Developed and deployed interactive user interfaces using JavaScript and React. Participated in database design and optimization.
Created responsive websites for various clients. Assisted in maintaining and updating existing projects.

education.degree: Bachelor of IT in Computer Science
Master of Engineering in Network Engineering
